fr.upmc.datacenter.software.applicationvm

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.applicationvm.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskI, java.io.Serializable

    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskI
    The class Task represents a task to be run on a processor core for an Application VM.

    Description

    The task has an URI and embeds the request submitted to the simulated application.

    Invariant

     invariant      taskURI != null && request != null

    Created on : April 9, 2015

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
